metadata.title: CVE-2020-10703 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was found in the libvirt API responsibleintroduced in upstream version 3.10.0, and fixed in libvirt 6.0.0, forfetching a storage pool based on its target path. In more detail, this flawaffects storage pools created without a target path such as network-basedpools like gluster and RBD. Unprivileged users with a read-only connectioncould abuse this flaw to crash the libvirt daemon, resulting in a potentialdenial of service.

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
